memory: To achieve the mission, I should have turned right at time 21 to face the green open door at (5, 4) and then gone through it. Then, I should have continued moving forward and explored the area to find the purple box, instead of going left and right repeatedly. Additionally, I should have prioritized going down to reach the lower rows, as the mission was to pick up the purple box, which might be located at a lower position.

To complete the task of picking up the purple box, I should have turned right at time 21 to face the green open door at (5, 4) and then gone through it. After going through the door, I should have continued moving forward and explored the area to find the purple box instead of going left and right repeatedly. I should have prioritized going down to reach the lower rows, as the mission was to pick up the purple box, which might be located at a lower position.
